contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Horst aan de Maas | native_name = ''Hoars aon de Maas'' | image_skyline = CentreBroekhuizen1.JPG | imagesize = | image_caption = Centre of Broekhuizen | image_flag = Horst aan de Maas vlag.svg | flag_size = 120x100px | image_shield = Horst_aan_de_Maas_wapen.svg | shield_size = 120x100px |image_map = LocatieHorstAanDeMaas.png |mapsize = 250px |latd=51|latm=26|lats=|latNS=N |longd=6|longm=6|longs=|longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Limburg (Netherlands)|Limburg]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 122.55 |area_land_km2 = 120.62 |area_water_km2 = 1.93 |population_as_of = 1 January 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 28845 |population_density_km2 = 239 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 }} '''Horst aan de Maas''' ({{Pronunciation|138 Horst aan de Maas.ogg}}) ({{lang-li|Haos aan de Maos}}) is a [[municipality]] in the southeastern [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[Limburg (Netherlands)|Limburg]]. In 2010 the municipalities [[Sevenum]] and part of [[Meerlo-Wanssum]] joined the municipality. == Population centres == [[America, Netherlands|America]], [[Broekhuizen, Limburg|Broekhuizen]], [[Broekhuizenvorst]], [[Evertsoort]], [[Griendtsveen]], [[Grubbenvorst]], [[Hegelsom]], [[Horst, Limburg|Horst]], [[Kronenberg, Netherlands|Kronenberg]] [[Lottum]], [[Meerlo]], [[Melderslo]], [[Meterik]], [[Sevenum]], [[Swolgen]] and [[Tienray]]. ==Notable people== *[[Hub van Doorne|Hub]] and [[Wim van Doorne]], founders of [[DAF Trucks|DAF]] *[[Willem Jozef Droesen]], [[House of Representatives of the Netherlands|Member of Parliament]] for the [[Roman-Catholic State Party]] (1933–1967) *[[Suzanne Freriks]], volleyball player *[[Heideroosjes]], punk rock band *[[Servaes Huys]], [[House of Representatives of the Netherlands|Member of Parliament]] for the [[Dutch Labour Party]] (1986–1998) *[[Twan Huys]], television presenter for [[Nova (Dutch TV series)|Nova]] *[[Raymond Knops]], [[House of Representatives of the Netherlands|Member of Parliament]] for the [[Christian Democratic Appeal]] (2005–2006, 2007–present) *[[Dirk Marcellis]], football player for [[AZ Alkmaar]] and [[Netherlands national football team|the Netherlands]] *[[Rowwen Hèze]], Limburgish folk band *[[Marijn Poels]], Independent documentarymaker ==External links== {{commonscat}}
